name: Chandanalepa Herbal Scrub
description: A unique Ayurvedic formula created with the highly effective medicinal essence of Sandalwood, Margosa, Venivel, Kokum Bark and Indian Turmeric. Chandanalepa Herbal Scrub contains Pro-vitamin B5 and natural Vitamin E that acts as a nourishing agent on your skin. It also removes dry, dead skin, safely making it healthy.
